string.text: An optical 5.0x SUSAT scope with built in heat visor designed to detect heat sources emanating from mammalian bodies. Attaches to weapons by means of the NATO-standard Picatinny rail.

%c[default]Characteristics:\n%c[255,238,153,26]* %c[default]Effect time = 120 seconds\n%c[default]It is designed to illuminate dark areas, Extremely useful at night and for foray's into underground areas.
